name: mooran2
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wa(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)))

stmt.origin: jca(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wa(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)))
-| wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wmo(s0, w0))
-| wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wmo(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wa(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)))
-| wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wmo(s0, w0))
-| wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wmo(s0, w1))

|- wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wa(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)))
-| wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wmo(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wmo(s0, w1))
-| wi(w1, wo(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wa(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w1, wo(w0, w1))
|- wi(wmo(s0, wo(w0, w1)), wa(wmo(s0, w0), wmo(s0, w1)))

comment: "At most one" exports disjunction to conjunction. (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 9-Jul-2011.)
